Some Tips You don't have to include the ChessAnarchy.css file if you're building a custom version. You can use any combination of divs and leave out the ones you don't need. You're strongly encouraged to add the chessAnarchyMyTeam and chessAnarchyOpponentTeam divs. They allow the user to change team and also see what government their team is using. The chessAnarchyOpponentTeam div should be placed above the board, while the chessAnarchyMyTeam div should go below the board. Visitors to your website will be randomly assigned to the Black or White team and the board will automatically place their team at the bottom. The chessAnarchyChat div will expand to fill the space given to it. You must give it a width and height to make it appear. The notation panel will start small and increase in height as the game progresses. You should give it a max-height and make it scrollable. You can add your own loading message or a gif to any div and Chess Anarchy will remove it once loaded.
